alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Ojai Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 11 at 5:06AM PDT until April 11 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Western San Fernando Valley, Eastern San Fernando Valley, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Ojai Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley
